attribs.name: npc_legendary_actions_desc
attribs.current: The Thousand Teeth can take 3, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Thousand Teeth regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LeDdbKs5TVQvGX-300N_description
attribs.current: Thousand Teeth makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LeDdbKs5TVQvGX-300P_description
attribs.current: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction-l_-LeDdbKs5TVQvGX-300Q_description
attribs.current: Thousand Teeth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction-l_-LeDdbKs5TVQvGX-300R_description
attribs.current: Thousand Teeth moves up to half its speed.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction-l_-LeDdbKs5TVQvGX-300S_description
attribs.current: Thousand Teeth makes a bite attack.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LeDdbKs5TVQvGX-300T_desc
attribs.current: Thousand Teeth can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LeDdbKs5TVQvGX-300U_desc
attribs.current: If Thousand Teeth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LeDdbKs5TVQvGX-300T_description
attribs.current: Thousand Teeth can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LeDdbKs5TVQvGX-300U_description
attribs.current: If Thousand Teeth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-Ml8GdMiCIhb5ljg5opZ_description
attribs.current: The Afanc "Thousand Teeth", spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided that it has no creature Grappled. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
